p.span:
Click here to enter South Bronx Charter School for
International Cultures & the Arts Remote Learning Center

span.style: color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 163px; height: 168px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Our school has received the following information that we wanted to share immediately with our families. SOME students with IEPs who are enrolled in NYC Charter Schools and who still need connected devices may be eligible to receive a DOE internet-connected iPad for remote Instruction.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We wanted to share this information with you in case your student has an IEP and is in need of an additional device. The deadline to complete this survey is 5 pm tomorrow. Please note that the DOE (not South Bronx Charter School for International Cultures and the Arts) will be coordinating the delivery and tech support of these devices.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: In order to receive a device by Thursday, April 30, families complete the Remote Learning Device Request Form by 5 p.m. Thursday, April 23.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Families that want to request a device should call DOE at 718-935-5100 and choose Option 5 on the menu for help getting a device with internet connection. Or, they can fill out the Remote Learning Device Request form at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 163px; height: 168px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Nuestra escuela ha recibido la siguiente informacin que queramos compartir de inmediato con nuestras familias. ALGUNOS estudiantes con IEP que estn inscritos en las escuelas charter de Nueva York y que an necesitan dispositivos conectados pueden ser elegibles para recibir un iPad conectado al Internet del DOE para la instruccin remota.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Queramos compartir esta informacin con usted en caso de que su estudiante tenga un IEP y necesite un dispositivo adicional. La fecha lmite para completar esta encuesta es a las 5 pm de maana. Tenga en cuenta que el DOE (no South Bronx Charter School for International Cultures and the Arts) coordinar la entrega y el soporte tcnico de estos dispositivos.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Para recibir un dispositivo antes del jueves 30 de abril, las familias completan el Formulario de solicitud de dispositivo de aprendizaje remoto antes de las 5 p.m. Jueves 23 de abril.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Las familias que deseen solicitar un dispositivo deben llamar al DOE al 718-935-5100 y elegir la Opcin 5 en el men para obtener ayuda para obtener un dispositivo con conexin a Internet. O bien, pueden completar el formulario de Solicitud de dispositivo de aprendizaje remoto en

p.em: Click the link below to watch or view the lottery results for 2020-2021 School Year.

span.style: color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

div.h2: South Bronx Charter School For International Cultures & the Arts

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.3px;

p.span: At SBCSICA, students acquire a genuine love of learning as they progress through our inquiry-based dual language program. Learning is active and draws from a range of experiences, from class investigationsto museum visits. The curriculum employs critical thinking skills and strategies where students learn to ask questions, take risks and think both creatively and analytically. Curriculum experiences not only nurture childrens curiosity and imagination, they prepare them with the foundation skills, knowledge and competencies critical for them to be successful as the 21st century citizens.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 16px;

br.span: Our core curriculum also includes daily enrichment through the Arts. From Kindergarten through Fifth grade, students explore art mediums such as drawing, painting, and sculpture while learning about different artists, art careers, and techniques.

a.title: Memorial Day Observed (School closed) Students return to school on Tuesday May 26, 2020
